server image¶

A server image is a disk image created from a running server instance. The image is created in the Image store.

Compute v2

server image create¶

Create a new disk image from a running server

os server image create
    [--name <image-name>]
    [--wait]
    <server>
--name <image-name>¶

Name of new image (default is server name)

--wait¶

Wait for image create to complete

<server>

Server (name or ID)
